_source.text: Actress and LGBT rights activist Cynthia Nixon gave a terrific interview to the New York Times, entitled "Life After Sex," in which she discusses her role in the Broadway revival of Wit, her pre and post Sex and the City fame and how "gay is better."

text: Actress and LGBT rights activist Cynthia Nixon gave a terrific interview to the New York Times, entitled "Life After Sex," in which she discusses her role in the **Broadway** revival of Wit, her pre and post Sex and the City fame and how "gay **is** **better**."
